string-array.name: privacy
string-array.item: ExpressBlog cares about the privacy of users and is taken very seriously. This describes the policy and procedures on the collection of data we store and share when you use the ExpressBlog platform.

string-array.name: copy
string-array.item: At ExpressBlog we expect from our users to respect the content made by others. We ask users to take care of avoiding the copyright of others. If you infringe the copyright by others your content can be removed and the account may be suspended as a whole if it comes to us in repeatedly.

string-array.name: trade
string-array.item: At ExpressBlog we expect from our users to respect the content made by others. We ask users to take care of avoiding the Trademark of others. If you infringe the Trademark by others your content can be removed and the account may be suspended as a whole if it comes to us in repeatedly.

string-array.name: use
string-array.item: ExpressBlog is a place where people share and grow their knowledge. We believe in educating every user who is part of the community. BE NICE AND RESPECT OTHERS. RESPECT THE PLATFORM. RESPECT THE RIGHTS. BE RESPECTFUL

string-array.name: welcome
string-array.item: Here are the terms and conditions for your service : Separate platform for growing and sharing knowledge: Our mission is to create a platform where users can share knowledge, ask for queries and this helps the community to grow. Content is yours: We also permit you to report the content posted without your permission. Responsibility: The content you post should not violate the legal laws of any third party. Rules of the platform: When you use the ExpressBlog platform you also agree to our Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, Copyright Policy, Trademark Policy, and Use Policy.
